display.title: Flight of Icarus
description: A pair of &&3Elytra&&r can be found at the bow of every &&2End Ship&&r.
They can be equipped in place of a chestplate, granting the ability to &&dglide through the air&&r with &&7[&&r&&6Space&&r&&7]&&r.
Flight direction is controlled by where you &&6look&&r. Be sure to &&dpull up or turn around&&r before striking surfaces as fast impacts deal heavy damage.
&&7[Aileron]&&r When placed close together, &&eCampfires&&r provide a boost of air while &&3gliding&&r.
&&eSmokestack&&r Elytras can charge boosts at a fire while &&6Sneaking&&r, consuming them with &&7[&&r&&6Space&&r&&7]&&r in the air.
&&3Firework Rockets&&r only leave a &&dcosmetic smoke trail&&r with Elytra.
